### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE NetworkConfigurations ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    service_name VARCHAR(50), 
    ip_address VARCHAR(15), 
    subnet_mask VARCHAR(15), 
    gateway_address VARCHAR(15) 
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceProviders ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    provider_name VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE Subscriptions ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    subscription_type VARCHAR(50), 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE, 
    provider_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES ServiceProviders(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE Devices ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_name VARCHAR(50), 
    device_type VARCHAR(50), 
    status VARCHAR(20), 
    provider_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES ServiceProviders(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE Policies ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    policy_name VARCHAR(50), 
    description TEXT, 
    provider_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES ServiceProviders(id) 
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET ip_address='192.168.1.100' WHERE id=1;
